title: Fertigo Pro Script released at MyFonts
author: Jos Buivenga

comments.content:
"The font nobody was waiting for."

Don't be so hard on yourself, Mr. Buivenga. :D

But not sharp enough I guess... the link above leads to the "regular" version for which I released a new italic.

\> [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155707/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/fertigo-pro-script/) \< is the link to the script.

Very nice script. :)

PS: Wat betekent dat druppeltje in je avatar?

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel
Thanks. The drop means that you're [obsessed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155707/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/).
A very fresh alternative for Lucida handwriting :)

Congrats again to the busiest guy in type design! I just saw it on MyFonts at this link:

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/fertigo-pro-script/overview.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155707/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/fertigo-pro-script/overview.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/exljbris/fertigo-pro-script/overview.html")

I assume that is the Pro version link?

Bravo, my friend,

ChrisL

Thanks a lot to the \*nicest\* guy in type design!

(Without the overview.html it works fine too btw)

Thanks, Jelmar.

Chris, I somehow missed your generous post(-it). Thanks a lot times two!!
